mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by bno desc
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_board(db_board.tbl_board.title, db_board.tbl_board.context, db_board.tbl_board.writer) values (#{title}, #{context}, #{writer})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update tbl_board set db_board.tbl_board.title=#{title}, db_board.tbl_board.writer=#{writer}, db_board.tbl_board.context=#{context} where db_board.tbl_board.bno=#{bno};
